articles.title: Moon mining rush: Russia to draw UN’s attention to US plans to grab lunar resources - TASS
articles.description: US President Donald Trump signed an executive order in April, proclaiming Washington’s right to extract various metals and other mineral resources on the Moon, particularly within the late phases of the Artemis lunar program
articles.content: MOSCOW, October 27. /TASS/. The issue of the US intention to extract mineral resources on the Moon will be discussed at the 75th session of the UN General Assembly at Russia’s request, the State Spac… [+1165 chars]
